name: android_metadata
sql: CREATE TABLE android_metadata (locale TEXT)

name: savedworkout
sql: CREATE TABLE savedworkout (id integer primary key, type integer, index1 integer, index2 integer, intvalue integer, doublevalue real, stringvalue text, backedup integer )

name: onerepmax
sql: CREATE TABLE onerepmax (id integer primary key, exercise_id integer, weightkg real, weightlb real,  oldweightkg real, oldweightlb real, incrementkg real, incrementlb real, backedup integer, FOREIGN KEY(exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(id))

name: current_program
sql: CREATE TABLE current_program (id integer primary key, program_id integer, week integer, backedup integer, FOREIGN KEY(program_id) REFERENCES programs(id))

name: history
sql: CREATE TABLE history (id integer primary key, date integer, program_id integer, day integer, day_name TEXT, realdays integer, duration integer, percentage integer, note TEXT, backedup integer, FOREIGN KEY(program_id) REFERENCES programs(id))

name: history_exercises
sql: CREATE TABLE history_exercises (id integer primary key, history_id integer, exercise_id integer, type integer DEFAULT 0,weightkg real, weightlb real, reps integer, max_reps integer, reptype integer, set_number integer, exercise_number integer, duration integer, percentage integer, backedup integer, supersetnumber INTEGER DEFAULT -1, RPE REAL DEFAULT 0.0, FOREIGN KEY(history_id) REFERENCES history(id), FOREIGN KEY(exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(id))

name: next_workout
sql: CREATE TABLE next_workout (id integer primary key, date integer, program_id integer, day integer, realdays integer, backedup integer, day_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(program_id) REFERENCES programs(id))

name: next_workout_exercises
sql: CREATE TABLE next_workout_exercises (id integer primary key, next_id integer, exercise_id integer, dependent_exercise_id integer, weightkg real, weightlb real, reps integer, reps2 integer, set_number integer, exercise_number integer, incrementkg real, incrementlb real, resttime1 integer, resttime2 integer, resttime3 integer, failures integer, failuresallowed integer, percentage real, reptype integer, exercisetype integer, increment text, backedup integer, increment_type INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deload_percentage INTEGER DEFAULT 10, dependentIncrementID integer DEFAULT -1, supersetnumber INTEGER DEFAULT -1, RPE real DEFAULT 0.0,FOREIGN KEY(next_id) REFERENCES nextWorkout(id), FOREIGN KEY(exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(id))

name: body_weight
sql: CREATE TABLE body_weight (id integer primary key, date integer, weight double, weightkg double, weightlb double, backedup integer)

name: warmups
sql: CREATE TABLE warmups (id integer primary key, name text, explanation text, scheme text, backedup integer )

name: weights
sql: CREATE TABLE weights (id integer primary key, type integer, weightunit integer, weight real, count integer, backedup integer)

name: programs
sql: CREATE TABLE programs (id integer primary key, routine text, routine_short_name text, days integer, realdays integer, program_days integer, category integer, routinetype text, level text, explanation text, theme_color integer, noofdays integer, backedup integer, when_to_update_weights INTEGER DEFAULT 1000, deleted integer DEFAULT 0)

name: program_exercises
sql: CREATE TABLE program_exercises (id integer primary key, program_id integer, exercise_id integer, dependent_exercise_id integer,weightkg real, weightlb real, reps integer, reps2 integer, set_number integer, exercise_number integer, day_number integer, failuresallowed integer, increment text, incrementkg real, incrementlb real, resttime1 integer, resttime2 integer, resttime3 integer, percentage real, reptype integer, exercisetype integer, backedup integer, day_name TEXT, increment_type INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deload_percentage INTEGER DEFAULT 10, dependentIncrementID integer DEFAULT -1, supersetnumber INTEGER DEFAULT -1, RPE REAL DEFAULT 0.0, FOREIGN KEY(program_id) REFERENCES programs(id), FOREIGN KEY(exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(id))

name: exercises
sql: CREATE TABLE exercises (id integer primary key, exercise_name text, explanation text, type integer, target_body integer, exercise_video text, exercise_pic1 text, exercise_pic2 text, picturetype integer, barbell_lb REAL DEFAULT 45.0, barbell_kg REAL DEFAULT 20.0, show_warm_up INTEGER DEFAULT 1, show_graph INTEGER DEFAULT 1, rest_time INTEGER DEFAULT 60, rest_time_last_rep INTEGER DEFAULT 90, backedup integer, roundkg real DEFAULT 2.5, roundlb real DEFAULT 5, tonnage_multiple INTEGER DEFAULT 1, warmup_type integer DEFAULT -1, deleted integer DEFAULT 0, original_name text)

name: freecustomworkouts
sql: CREATE TABLE freecustomworkouts (id integer primary key, count integer, backedup integer)

name: increment_schemes
sql: CREATE TABLE increment_schemes (id integer primary key, name text, explanation text, scheme text, backedup integer )

name: additional_next_workout
sql: CREATE TABLE additional_next_workout (id integer primary key, additional_workout_id integer, date integer, program_id integer, day integer, realdays integer, backedup integer, day_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(program_id) REFERENCES programs(id))

name: additional_next_workout_exercises
sql: CREATE TABLE additional_next_workout_exercises (id integer primary key, next_id integer, exercise_id integer, dependent_exercise_id integer, weightkg real, weightlb real, reps integer, reps2 integer, set_number integer, exercise_number integer, incrementkg real, incrementlb real, resttime1 integer, resttime2 integer, resttime3 integer, failures integer, failuresallowed integer, percentage real, reptype integer, exercisetype integer, increment text, backedup integer,dependentIncrementID integer DEFAULT -1, supersetnumber INTEGER DEFAULT -1, increment_type INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deload_percentage INTEGER DEFAULT 10,FOREIGN KEY(next_id) REFERENCES nextWorkout(id), FOREIGN KEY(exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(id))

name: additional_savedworkout
sql: CREATE TABLE additional_savedworkout (id integer primary key, additional_workout_id integer, type integer, index1 integer, index2 integer, intvalue integer, doublevalue real, stringvalue text, backedup integer )

name: additional_onerepmax
sql: CREATE TABLE additional_onerepmax (id integer primary key, additional_workout_id integer, exercise_id integer, weightkg real, weightlb real,  oldweightkg real, oldweightlb real, incrementkg real, incrementlb real, backedup integer, FOREIGN KEY(exercise_id) REFERENCES exercises(id))

name: additional_workouts
sql: CREATE TABLE additional_workouts (id integer primary key, program_id integer, FOREIGN KEY(program_id) REFERENCES programs(id))
